timeline.message: Changed editMode from f:viewParam to o:viewParam

removed the viewParam for editMode

editMode is set in the init method and is not used as a viewParam

timeline.bodyText: Weird. Couldn't tell what, if anything, changed on this line. Same with the template.xhtml file.
timeline.author: mheppler
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -197,4 +196,4 @@
             </ui:define>
         </ui:composition>
     </h:body>
-</html>
\ No newline at end of file
+</html>

timeline.bodyText: Why was this editMode viewParam removed on guestbook.xhtml, but converted to an OmniFaces component on this file? Does not seem to be utilized on that page, as far as I can tell.
timeline.author: mheppler
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,7 +20,7 @@
                 <f:metadata>
                     <f:viewParam name="id" value="#{TemplatePage.templateId}"/>
                     <f:viewParam name="ownerId" value="#{TemplatePage.ownerId}"/>
-                    <f:viewParam name="editMode" value="#{TemplatePage.editMode}"/>
+                    <o:viewParam name="editMode" value="#{TemplatePage.editMode}"/>

replies.bodyText:
It's used in manageTemplates where you can edit a template and the edit button passes the edit mode in the url:
<h:outputLink value="/template.xhtml?id=#{template.id}&ownerId=#{manageTemplatesPage.dataverse.id}&editMode=METADATA">
<h:outputText value="#{bundle['dataset.manageTemplates.tab.action.btn.edit.metadata']}" />
</h:outputLink>
replies.author: sekmiller

timeline.bodyText: Same comment as on guestbook.xhtml. What changed?
timeline.author: mheppler
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -127,4 +128,4 @@
             </ui:define>
         </ui:composition>
     </h:body>
-</html>
\ No newline at end of file
+</html>
